title: IL.Y.A.LONGTEMPS.QUE.JE.T'AIME (I'VE LOVED YOU SO LONG)2008.PA
description:
Description
Kristin Scott Thomas (FOUR WEDDINGS AND A FUNERAL, 
THE ENGLISH PATIENT) stars in this searing French drama 
about a woman who reunites with her young sister after a 15-year 
separation. Philippe Claudel directs a cast that also includes Elsa 
Zylberstein (THAT DAY).

Technical Details

Sound: Dolby Digital
Running Time: 113 minutes
Production Year: 2008
Main Language: French

Genre: Drama
Certificate: 18 Suitable for 18 years and over. 
Directed by: Philippe Claudel and Philippe Claudel
Actors: Kristin Scott Thomas, Elsa Zylberstein, Serge Hazanavicius, 
Laurent Grevill, Frederic Pierrot, Claire Johnston, Catherine Hosmalin, 
Jean Claude Arnaud, Olivier Cruveiller, Lise Segur
